test.name: Verify Random Joke API

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Get Random Joke
kw.doc: Keyword to get a random joke.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=jokesApi, url=https://official-joke-api.appspot.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://official-joke-api.appspot.com/random_joke path_url=/random_joke headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/1.26.x/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings warnings.warn(

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.msg: ${joke} = {'type': 'general', 'setup': 'Why do bears have hairy coats?', 'punchline': 'Fur protection.', 'id': 341}

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Random joke: Why do bears have hairy coats? - Fur protection.

test.doc: Test to verify that the random joke API returns a valid response.
